title: BMCR23
description: Actual temperature is higher than set high band limit.(High Band limit = Set temperature + High band)
reasons_remedies: The temperature of the embossing heater is high (15 0C less than the set temperature).
Check the temperature which is set for the embossing heater.
Check the band value, which is set for embossing the heater.
Check the temperature sensor of the embossing heater.
Check functioning of Solid State Relay (S.S. R).
Check with multimeter if SSR is giving output in off State. Replace SSR if output is avaliable in off state.
Check if thermocouple is connected properly.
Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMCR23
Error Code 23
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR23
Alarm Message: Embossing High Temperature
Description: Actual temperature is higher than set high band limit.(High Band limit = Set temperature + High band)
Reason & Remedy:
1. The temperature of the embossing heater is high (15 0C less than the set temperature).
2. Check the temperature which is set for the embossing heater.
3. Check the band value, which is set for embossing the heater.
4. Check the temperature sensor of the embossing heater.
5. The heater is on continuously.
6. Check functioning of Solid State Relay (S.S. R).
7. Check with multimeter if SSR is giving output in off State. Replace SSR if output is avaliable in off state.
8. Check if thermocouple is connected properly.
9. PID parameters.
10. Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
Visual References:
- Embossing Screen
